conbody.p: This guide is intended for people who are currently using Eucalyptus and who want to harden the cloud and underlying configuration.
This guide covers available controls and best practices for securing your Eucalyptus cloud. Cloud security depends on security across many layers of infrastructure and technology:

ul.li: Security of the physical infrastructure and hosts

conbody.p: For background information on cloud security, we recommend the Amazon Web Services Security Best Practices whitepaper.
